message.content:
To set up a React project with TypeScript and Tailwind, I recommend using Vite:

1. Run `npm create vite@latest my-app -- --template react-ts`
2. Install Tailwind: `npm install -D tailwindcss postcss autoprefixer`
3. Initialize Tailwind: `npx tailwindcss init -p`
4. Configure your `tailwind.config.js` content paths
5. Add Tailwind directives to your CSS

Would you like me to walk through any of these steps in detail?
